name: Mundo
description:
Mundo is a medieval 3D MMORPG full of NPCs and monsters! You will grow stronger as soon you complete missions and fight the monsters, and you can get new and powerful weapons!

The NPCs will give quests to you. Sometimes you will just help them, other times the mission will engage you in lethal battles!

There is more than 1.000.000 m² of scenery, plus buildings, caves and undergrounds! Several monsters and seven bosses will cross your path to complete the 100 missions of the game.

Prepare for the fight!
